dct_description_sm:
The drainage basins distributed with the HYDRO1k data set suite are 
derived using the vector stream networks along with the flow direction data set. 
Each polygon in the basin data set has been tagged with a Pfafstetter code 
uniquely identifying each sub-basin. A detailed description of the coding scheme 
can be found in Verdin. Additional attributes defining the characteristics of 
each sub-basin have been developed.
